reviews_pros.description: Ease of Use: Intuitive interface for creating onboarding flows and in-app experiences without coding skills.
Customer Support: Responsive and helpful support team.
Comprehensive Features: Variety of tools for user engagement, analytics, and feedback collection.
Customizable In-App Experiences: Ability to create tailored onboarding experiences and targeted messaging.
Behavioral Analytics: Robust analytics on user behavior and feature adoption.

reviews_cons.description: Learning Curve: Steep learning curve due to extensive features.
Installation Complexity: Requires technical work for setup.
Limited Customization: Limitations in customization options, particularly regarding UI design and analytics capabilities.
Clunky Interface: Certain features are clunky or unintuitive.
Occasional Glitches: Users have experienced occasional glitches and freezing.
